column2: The Super Destroyers(A.J. Petrucci and Doug Stahl)
column8: Petrucci and Stahl won the titles in a tournament final.

column2: The Suicide Blondes(Chris Candido, Johnny Hotbody, and Chris Michaels)
column8: All three wrestlers were recognized as champions, and were able to defend the titles in any combination via the Freebird rule. Aired 5-25-93 on TV
ECW vacated the title after Candido left the promotion for the Smoky Mountain Wrestling organization.

column2: The Dark Patriot and Eddie Gilbert
column8: The Dark Patriot and Gilbert won the titles in a tournament final. Aired 9-7-93 on TV
ECW vacated the championships after The Dark Patriot and Eddie Gilbert left the organization.
Hotbody and Stetson were awarded the titles by ECW.
Defeat Dreamer and Shane Douglas, who was substituting for an injured Gunn. After the bout, Douglas turned against Dreamer and became a heel. Aired 12-14-93 on TV
